name: Chiraiahgari Gokul Krishna Reddy
objective: To leverage my strong foundation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, along with hands-on experience in research and real-world projects, to contribute to innovative solutions in a dynamic tech-driven organization. Passionate about applying deep learning and data analytics for impactful and scalable technologies, while continuously evolving as a developer and researcher
education:
SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai, India
Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence GPA: 8.26/10.00
Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education, Hyderabad, India
High School Graduation Percentage: 90.6
Adarsha High School, Kurnool, AP, India
High School Graduation GPA: 9.2/10.00
projects:
Neural Machine Translation
• Developed a Custom Transformer Encoder-Decoder model Architecture with 100M parameters.
• Utilized Google Collab’s T4 GPU to train and evaluate the model achieving a BLEU score of 6.
Anomaly Framework for Health Recommendation in Ambient Assistance Living System using AR
• Integrated AR with AALS for real-time elderly monitoring using Python, Django, WebAR, and ML-based
action recognition.
• Ensured personalized health recommendations and enhanced safety through intelligent AI-driven assistance.
Personalized Context-Aware Action Localization
• WTMR-Net integrates contextual and multimodal features for personalized activity recognition and local-
ization.
• Combines ViLT model for video action detection with Visual Question Answering using NLP techniques.• Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI Certified Professional
• Digital Intelligence - PwC Switzerland
• Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - Stanford
• Object-Oriented Data Structures in C++ - University of Illinois
virtual_internships:
AICTE AI-ML Internship - Worked as an Intern for 3 months
• Throughout this program, I acquired practical knowledge and expanded my understanding of AI and ML. I
completed AICTE-sponsored internships where I built and deployed AI/ML models to real-world problems,
improving my data analysis skills and algorithmic methods.
• Some of the Jobs I worked on this program provided me with some working experience, both in AI and ML.
research_papers:
Explainable SIR Forecasting Model for Herd Immunity Prediction in COVID-19— Jan 2024—
IEEE - ICACRS 2023
• Developed an Explainable SIR Forecasting Model integrated with Machine Learning (ML) and Explainable
AI (XAI) to predict COVID-19 herd immunity thresholds.
• Worked with a 2-person team alongside an Assistant Professor.
• Utilized epidemiological data, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and SHAP-based feature analysis.
• Enhanced transparency in disease modeling for public health decision-making.
Detection Of Elusive Polyp Using U-Net for Polyp Segmentation
• Implemented a U-Net-based Deep Convolutional Neural Network (DCNN) for polyp segmentation in colonoscopy
images.
• Used TensorFlow/Keras for model training and OpenCV for preprocessing.
• Trained the model on the CVC-ClinicDB dataset.
• Submitted the paper to the International Conference on Recent Advances in Emerging Computing and
Communication Technologies (ICRAECCT 2025).
certifications:
• Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI Certified Professional
• Digital Intelligence - PwC Switzerland
• Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - Stanford
• Object-Oriented Data Structures in C++ - University of Illinois
extracurricular_activities:
• Runner-up, University Cricket Competition, SRM University 2024
• DSA Member, Directorate of Student Affairs, SRM University
• AI and ML Content Writer, Earth5R UNESCO-recognized global environmental organization

Jan 2024— IEEE - ICACRS 2023 • Developed an Explainable SIR Forecasting Model
integrated with Machine Learning (ML) and Explainable AI (XAI) to predict
COVID-19 herd immunity thresholds. • Worked with a 2-person team alongside an
Assistant Professor. • Utilized epidemiological data, Random Forest, Gradient
Boosting, and SHAP-based feature analysis. • Enhanced transparency in disease
modeling for public health decision-making. Detection Of Elusive Polyp Using
U-Net for Polyp Segmentation • Implemented a U-Net-based Deep Convolutional
Neural Network (DCNN) for polyp segmentation in colonoscopy images. • Used
TensorFlow/Keras for model training and OpenCV for preprocessing. • Trained
the model on the CVC-ClinicDB dataset.
certifications:
• Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI Certified Professional • Digital
Intelligence - PwC Switzerland • Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and
Classification - Stanford • Object-Oriented Data Structures in C++ -
University of Illinois
extracurricular_activities:
• Runner-up, University Cricket Competition, SRM University 2024 • DSA Member,
Directorate of Student Affairs, SRM University • AI and ML Content Writer,
Earth5R UNESCO-recognized global environmental organization

name: Laxmi Nivas Morishetty
Chiraiahgari Gokul Krishna Reddy
objective:
To leverage my strong foundation in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, along with hands-on experience in resea
rch and real-world projects, to contribute to innovative solutions in a dynamic tech-driven organization. Passionate about a
pplying deep learning and data analytics for impactful and scalable technologies, while continuously evolving as a develop
er and researcher
education:
SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai, India
Bachelor of Technology in Artificial Intelligence GPA: 8.26/10.00

Telangana State Board of Intermediate Education, Hyderabad, India
High School Graduation Percentage: 90.6

Adarsha High School, Kurnool, AP, India
High School Graduation GPA: 9.2/10.00
projects:
Neural Machine Translation
• Developed a Custom Transformer Encoder-Decoder model Architecture with 100M parameters.
• Utilized Google Collab’s T4 GPU to train and evaluate the model achieving a BLEU score of 6.
Anomaly Framework for Health Recommendation in Ambient Assistance Living System using AR
• Integrated AR with AALS for real-time elderly monitoring using Python, Django, WebAR, and ML-based
action recognition.
• Ensured personalized health recommendations and enhanced safety through intelligent AI-driven assistance.
Personalized Context-Aware Action Localization
• WTMR-Net integrates contextual and multimodal features for personalized activity recognition and local-
ization.
• Combines ViLT model for video action detection with Visual Question Answering using NLP techniques.• Oracle Cloud
Infrastructure Generative AI Certified Professional
• Digital Intelligence - PwC Switzerland
• Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - Stanford
• Object-Oriented Data Structures in C++ - University of Illinois
virtual_internships:
AICTE AI-ML Internship - Worked as an Intern for 3 months
• Throughout this program, I acquired practical knowledge and expanded my understanding of AI and ML. I
completed AICTE-sponsored internships where I built and deployed AI/ML models to real-world problems,
improving my data analysis skills and algorithmic methods.
• Some of the Jobs I worked on this program provided me with some working experience, both in AI and ML.
research_papers:
Explainable SIR Forecasting Model for Herd Immunity Prediction in COVID-19— Jan 2024—
IEEE - ICACRS 2023
• Developed an Explainable SIR Forecasting Model integrated with Machine Learning (ML) and Explainable
AI (XAI) to predict COVID-19 herd immunity thresholds.
• Worked with a 2-person team alongside an Assistant Professor.
• Utilized epidemiological data, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, and SHAP-based feature analysis.
• Enhanced transparency in disease modeling for public health decision-making.
Detection Of Elusive Polyp Using U-Net for Polyp Segmentation
• Implemented a U-Net-based Deep Convolutional Neural Network (DCNN) for polyp segmentation in colonoscopy
images.
• Used TensorFlow/Keras for model training and OpenCV for preprocessing.
• Trained the model on the CVC-ClinicDB dataset.
certifications:
• Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Generative AI Certified Professional
• Digital Intelligence - PwC Switzerland
• Supervised Machine Learning: Regression and Classification - Stanford
• Object-Oriented Data Structures in C++ - University of Illinois
extracurricular_activities:
• Runner-up, University Cricket Competition, SRM University 2024
• DSA Member, Directorate of Student Affairs, SRM University
• AI and ML Content Writer, Earth5R UNESCO-recognized global environmental organization

research_papers:
Explainable SIR Forecasting Model for Herd Immunity Prediction in COVID-19—
Jan 2024— IEEE - ICACRS 2023 • Developed an Explainable SIR Forecasting Model
integrated with Machine Learning (ML) and Explainable AI (XAI) to predict
COVID-19 herd immunity thresholds. • Worked with a 2-person team alongside an
Assistant Professor. • Utilized epidemiological data, Random Forest, Gradient
Boosting, and SHAP-based feature analysis. • Enhanced transparency in disease
modeling for public health decision-making. Detection Of Elusive Polyp Using
U-Net for Polyp Segmentation • Implemented a U-Net-based Deep Convolutional
Neural Network (DCNN) for polyp segmentation in colonoscopy images. • Used
TensorFlow/Keras for model training and OpenCV for preprocessing. • Trained
the model on the CVC-ClinicDB dataset. • Submitted the paper to the
International Conference on Recent Advances in Emerging Computing and
Communication Technologies (ICRAECCT 2025).
